snippet: It's the Midwest inspiration for Shake Shack.
abstract: It's the Midwest inspiration for Shake Shack.
lead_paragraph: For its first outlet in New York, Steak 'n Shake Signature, opening Thursday in the theater district, the Steak 'n Shake chain is making some additions to its menu. Along with the chain's original "smashed'' four-ounce burger, pressed on the griddle to be thin and crisp, the new shop has a six-ounce Signature Steakburger made with organic beef and only gently pressed. And for the first time, there will be beer and wine. This sleek, 20-seat spot has new self-service Coke machines to permit custom flavorings.

headline.main: Steak 'n Shake Comes to New York
